thread.title: The Portfolio of FOSJOAS Electric Self-balancing Scooters
thread.title_full: The Portfolio of FOSJOAS Electric Self-balancing Scooters

title: The Portfolio of FOSJOAS Electric Self-balancing Scooters
text: The Portfolio of FOSJOAS Electric Self-balancing Scooters Since Moben Global Inc. was establish and pushed out the core brand of scooter FOSJOAS in the year of 2010, FOSJOAS has gone through numerous challenges and opportunities. Now FOSJOAS enjoys a great popularity all over the world. The FOSJOAS electric self-balancing scooters by Moben Global Inc. gains a wide acceptance both at home and abroad. China, 21 September 2015 -- FOSJOAS has come to prominence through a couple of yearsâ€™ development. Since Moben Global Inc. was establish and pushed out the core brand of scooter FOSJOAS in the year of 2010, FOSJOAS has gone through numerous challenges and opportunities. Now FOSJOAS enjoys a great popularity all over the world. The FOSJOAS electric self-balancing scooters by Moben Global Inc. gains a wide acceptance both at home and abroad.Shortly after Moben Global Inc. was set up, it immediately ran up against the stark problem. In order to leave itself on a sound footing in the market for scooter, it was urgent to roll out a type of electric self-balancing scooter. A month later, Moben Global Inc. released its first model, V3. V3 was one set of twin-wheeled intelligent scooter . By virtue of its premium quality and stylish design, FOSJOAS V3 allured a host of scooter-lovers and established a solid customer base at once. To cater for the taste of some veteran players of electric scooters, FOSJOAS unveiled the single single-wheeled scooter V6. FOSJOAS V6 used the single-wheeled design. Sporting the single wheel, FOSJOAS V9 took pride in its agility. Especially when turning corners, the rider could make it quickly and freely. Therefore, FOSJOAS V6 has been maintaining the height of agility. In following years, FOSJOAS made a bold decision in the hope of breaking yoke of the current model. Moben Global Inc. went great lengths to R & D. Through trial or errors, Moben Global Inc. released the original two-wheeled scooter. The first two-wheeled scooter was V9, whose arrival put FOSJOAS on the map once again. After soon, FOSJOAS got making a modification to V9 and upgrading V9. The subsequent U3 inherited some elements from V9 and owned its characteristics at the same time. Much to excitement, the success culminated in FOSJOAS K3. It is promising that the high momentum of FOSJOAS will linger for years to come. # # #
